remarks: Binary relationship form of the outer five segment predicate. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 21-Sep-2013.)
statement:
brafs.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
brafs.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
brafs.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
brafs.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
brafs.o $e |- O = ( AFS ` G ) $.
brafs.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
brafs.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.
brafs.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. P ) $.
brafs.4 $e |- ( ph -> D e. P ) $.
brafs.5 $e |- ( ph -> X e. P ) $.
brafs.6 $e |- ( ph -> Y e. P ) $.
brafs.7 $e |- ( ph -> Z e. P ) $.
brafs.8 $e |- ( ph -> W e. P ) $.
brafs $p |- ( ph -> ( <. <. A , B >. , <. C , D >. >. O <. <. X , Y >. , <. Z , W >. >. <-> ( ( B e. ( A I C ) /\ Y e. ( X I Z ) ) /\ ( ( A .- B ) = ( X .- Y ) /\ ( B .- C ) = ( Y .- Z ) ) /\ ( ( A .- D ) = ( X .- W ) /\ ( B .- D ) = ( Y .- W ) ) ) ) ) $.
